definition: to fan/to slap sb on the face
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc

sentences.english: With the plantain fan, Monkey put out the fire.
sentences.chinese: 用芭蕉扇扇，猴扑灭了火。

sentences.english: On a summer evening grandpa will go out for a walk waving a palm leaf fan.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，爷爷吃完饭就摇着芭蕉扇出门了。

definition: The Nine-Toothed Rake (weapon of Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4])
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
Mountain of Flames of legend/fig. insurmountable obstacle/Mountain of Flames in Turpan depression in Xinjiang
golden cudgel, weapon wielded by Sun Wukong in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
Muzha, a figure in Chinese mythology
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
